description._default: Memory safe implementation of sudo and su
description.sudo: Execute a command as another user [sudo-rs]
description.sudo_logsrvd: sudo event and I/O log server [sudo-rs]
description.sudo_sendlog: Send sudo I/O log to log server [sudo-rs]
description.sudoedit: An extension of the sudo -e command to edit a file [sudo-rs]
description.su: Change user id or become root [sudo-rs]

note: [DO NOT RUN] (Meant for pkgforge CI Only)
Built From Source (Latest Git HEAD). Check/Report @ https://github.com/trifectatechfoundation/sudo-rs
sudo must be owned by uid 0 and have the setuid bit set
Also requires PAM to be setup: https://github.com/trifectatechfoundation/sudo-rs#differences-from-original-sudo
